snippet: The police say that Arsal Khan Khichi turned a charity feast deadly, killing 20 people in a plot against a cousin who beat him in a local election.
abstract: Police in Pakistan say politician Arsal Khan Khichi is responsible for deaths of 20 people after having food poisoned at charity feast in plot against cousin who beat him in local election.
lead_paragraph: The police say that Arsal Khan Khichi turned a charity feast deadly, killing 20 people in a plot against a cousin who beat him in a local election.

headline.main: In Pakistan, Police See Political Revenge Behind Poisoning Deaths
headline.print_headline: Police See Political Revenge Behind Poisoning Deaths in Pakistan
